meanings.sent1: Her overeagerness to help often led to mistakes.
meanings.sent2: His overeagerness to win the game made him rush his moves.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's overeagerness to greet visitors resulted in jumping on them.
meanings.sent4: The overeagerness of the flowers to bloom early was thwarted by a late frost.
meanings.sent5: The overeagerness of the child to open the present resulted in tearing the wrapping paper.

meanings.definition: The state of being too eager or enthusiastic.
meanings.sent1: The overeagerness of the students to answer every question made the teacher smile.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't contain her overeagerness to start the new project.
meanings.sent3: His overeagerness to impress the boss led to a comical mix-up in the office.
meanings.sent4: The overeagerness of the squirrel to gather nuts before winter led to a stash in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The overeagerness of the fans to meet the celebrity caused a commotion at the event.
